member.name: T:Inetlab.SMPP.Common.ConnectionMode

member.summary: Connection mode not specified.

member.name: F:Inetlab.SMPP.Common.ConnectionMode.Transmitter
member.summary: An ESME bound as a Transmitter is authorised to send short messages to the SMSC and to receive the corresponding SMPP responses from the SMSC.

member.name: F:Inetlab.SMPP.Common.ConnectionMode.Receiver
member.summary: An ESME bound as a Receiver is authorised to receive short messages from the SMSC and to return the corresponding SMPP message responses to the SMSC.

member.name: F:Inetlab.SMPP.Common.ConnectionMode.Transceiver
member.summary: An ESME bound as a Transceiver is allowed to send messages to the SMSC and receive messages from the SMSC over a single SMPP session.
